content.rendered:
Our Dahlias & Loco Love offers a delightful fusion of fine taste and supporting local. Exquisite Dahlias, lovingly grown by our wonderful Dahlia micro grower, nestled in the picturesque scenic rim of Mount Tamborine, paired with artisanal Loco Love chocolates, handmade in the beautiful Byron Bay. We add no additional foliage. 

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two Dahlia dahlia flowers the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.

We add no additional foliage.  Finished with our signature…
